title: The Ultimate List of Truth or Drink Questions

steps.title: Turn up the heat with some dirty Truth or Drink questions.
steps.content: Turn up the heat with some dirty Truth or Drink questions. After all, the point of the game is that people may want to drink to get out of answering these super-steamy questions! Dig deep into everyone’s most romantic or ~intimate~ stories with these Truth or Drink questions for adults: [1] X Research source Can you name a famous porn star? Have you ever been to a strip club? Have you ever watched a celebrity sex tape? Have you ever hooked up with more than one person on the same night? What’s the naughtiest dream you’ve ever had? What’s the cringiest thing you’ve said during dirty talk? Do you like to, or would you want to watch adult movies with a partner? What’s a fantasy of yours that’s yet to happen? Have you performed a sexual act at work? Who was the worst performer out of everyone you've slept with? What are your favorite and least favorite positions? Have you ever fallen asleep during sex? Have you ever filmed yourself doing something intimate? Have you ever given or gotten a lap dance? How far have you gone sexually in public? Do you think you’re good in bed? How many sex toys do you own? Have you ever been in a secret relationship? Who was the last person you had sex with? Have you ever slept with more than one partner at the same time?

steps.title: Reveal some secrets with these fun and flirty questions.
steps.content: Reveal some secrets with these fun and flirty questions. You may learn something about your fellow players that you never would have guessed! But remember that “if a question is too personal or uncomfortable,” dating coach Laura Bilotta advises, “you can always use the ‘skip’ option and move on to the next question.” Do you have any secret tattoos? Have you ever been blackmailed? Have you ever had a crush on a cartoon character? If so, who? Have you ever been in a bar fight? Where did you go on your first date? Have you ever been in trouble with the police? Describe your first real kiss. Then describe your last kiss. Have you ever participated in ding-dong-ditch? How many people have you slept with, and do you regret any of them? Have you ever hooked up with the same person as your best friend? Have you ever been skinny dipping? Have you ever been the subject of a made-up rumor? What's the most embarrassing experience you've had while in bed? What's your craziest one-night stand story? If you died and woke up in the afterlife, who would you want to hook up with? What color is your underwear? What do you think is your “type”? Have you ever walked in on someone or been walked in on? Would you ever consider being in an open relationship? Have you ever given a fake number to someone who was hitting on you?

steps.title: Get to know someone better with these deep and personal Qs.
steps.content: Get to know someone better with these deep and personal Qs. You could try out these questions with a close friend, romantic partner, or even at a dinner party with a particularly close group. These questions are sure to help you learn more about your fellow players, and you may even learn something new about yourself! [2] X Research source ​​Do you​​ tend to judge people based on how they look? Have you ever done something so wrong that you immediately regretted it? Who was the first person you fell in love with? What’s your biggest regret? What's more important to you, a relationship or your career? Have you ever cried on public transportation? Have you had a recurring nightmare? What do you think people misjudge you about? What’s something you dislike about your own gender? Do you believe in monogamy? What do you think messed you up the most as a kid? Are you close to your parents? What's the best piece of advice you've ever been given? When was the last time you cried? What kind of impression do you think people first have after meeting you? Who would you most like to improve your relationship with? If you could go back 5-10 years and change the course of your life, would you? What's a deal-breaker for you in a relationship? What are your vices? Have they gotten better or worse over time? Do you think that you’re happier or sadder than the average person?

steps.title: Go with some goofy questions to get everyone giggling.
steps.content: Go with some goofy questions to get everyone giggling. These questions are great for groups that want a little bit of lighthearted fun mixed in with their drinking game. Funny Truth or Drink questions are also a great option if playing with (adult) family members—although you may want to skip some of the more intimate questions. When was the last time you went commando because you were out of clean underwear? What is your least favorite animal? Where's the worst place you've ever gotten a sunburn? What's the most embarrassing photo on your phone? What do you do when you run out of toilet paper? Have you ever attended a concert completely drunk? Have you ever gone number two in your pants? How do you feel about hickeys? Has your house ever been egged? What about you do you think gives other people “the ick”? Can you spell "colonel"? What's the most daring thing you've ever done while drunk? Have you ever tasted breast milk (not counting when you were an infant)? Do you currently have any rotten or moldy food in your fridge? What's the funniest joke you know by heart? Have you ever practiced kissing in a mirror? What reality competition show do you think you really have a good chance of winning? Have you ever had an imaginary friend? Which fashion trend are you embarrassed to admit you’ve taken part in? What’s your Roman Empire ?

steps.title: Choose from these random Truth or Drink questions for any occasion.
steps.content: Choose from these random Truth or Drink questions for any occasion. If your game is taking a turn toward dirty or deep questions, these out-of-left-field questions may help you switch things up. These are also great questions for people who aren’t super close and don’t want to reveal too much! [3] X Research source What’s your favorite guilty pleasure snack? Who’s your favorite Kardashian? Is there a limit to what you’d do for the right amount of money? How many selfies do you take in a week? You're given $1 million to spend on anything you want—what are you buying? Have you ever purchased a self-help book? What do you think is your best physical feature? Have you ever lied on a dating app? What kind of pajamas do you prefer to sleep in? If you were a fast food restaurant, which one would you be and why? What’s your guilty pleasure song? Have you ever gotten a speeding ticket? What are your three biggest red flags? What’s a reason that you would quit your job without any notice? If you could have dinner with any historical figure, who would it be? What's the craziest thing you've ever done on a dare? If you could live in any fictional world, where would you choose? What's the first thing you'd do if you won the lottery? What’s the most surprising thing in your bag right now? What’s the weirdest thing you’re obsessed with on TikTok?

steps.title: Get people talking with these icebreaker questions.
steps.content: Get people talking with these icebreaker questions. All of these questions are great conversation starters and are bound to get people chatting (or maybe even arguing lightheartedly). Use these at a work dinner, pregame party, or any shindig that needs a little bit of kickstart. [4] X Research source What would you do if you woke up on a deserted island? Do you sleep with a fitted and straight sheet? Did you ever get detention in school? Do you prefer going out or staying in? Do you prefer waffles or pancakes? Do you pee in the shower? Have you ever had your fortune told? Did you believe it? Do you believe in ghosts? What are three things you couldn’t survive without? If you had to choose just one, are you ordering fries or tater tots? If you were allowed to do anything you wanted without consequences for a whole day, what would you do? Do you know your personality type using the Myers-Brigg system? Do you believe in astrology? Do you follow the five-second rule when you drop food? Would you accept an arranged marriage? Do you prefer using subtitles when watching television? Would you spend a weekend in a haunted house in exchange for $1,000? Have you ever been caught sleepwalking? If you can only have sex or cheese for the rest of your life, which would you choose? What’s your go-to song for singing in the shower?

steps.title: Break the ice on a date with some probing questions.
steps.content: Break the ice on a date with some probing questions. Whether your game opponent is your longtime crush, latest fling, or your most recent Tinder match, these questions are a great way to get to know them while also bringing the fun to a potentially awkward dinner date. Two birds, one stone! [5] X Research source Who was your first celebrity crush? What's your go-to comfort food? What's your biggest pet peeve? What do you consider to be the most romantic thing a person could do? Do you believe in soulmates? What about you do you think turns me on? What was the last reality T.V. show you watched? How would you propose to someone? Have you ever agreed to a date just for the free meal? How many pillows do you sleep with? What's the furthest you've ever gone on a first date? How long did it take you to finish the last book you read? How often do you eat dinner in front of the television? If you could rename yourself, what name would you choose? What's your favorite place to be kissed? How many exes are still in your contacts? What animal do you think I most resemble, either personality or looks-wise? Did you ever skip class in high school? What was your favorite movie as a kid? If you could have any pet in the world, what would it be?

steps.title: Get the party started with these group-focused questions.
steps.content: Get the party started with these group-focused questions. While any adult Truth or Drink questions work well for a party, these work particularly well for large groups of people. Ask players truth-telling questions about other people in the group, or ask them a question that will elicit a great story to entertain the whole crowd. [6] X Research source Who in the group would you want by your side in a zombie apocalypse? Would you kiss the person next to you? Which person in the group is the funniest? Have you slept with anyone in the room? How many people in this group have you had a crush on? Have you ever lied about your age to get into a bar or club? Who’s the worst dancer in the group? What's something you've Googled that you aren't proud to admit? Who in the group has the most attractive parents? Have you ever stalked anyone in this room on social media? What was the last illegal thing you did? Out of everyone in the room, who is the most likely to get arrested and why? Who in the room has the biggest potty mouth? If you could switch lives with anyone for a day, who would it be? Can you reenact your first kiss with someone in this room? Is there anyone here that you wish you were closer friends with? Do you have a hidden talent or party trick? Rate everyone playing from your most to least favorite. Who at the party would you choose to hook up with to make an ex jealous? Tell us your most embarrassing puking story.

steps.title: Get to know your bestie even better with these questions.
steps.content: Get to know your bestie even better with these questions. Whether you’re chatting over cocktails at your favorite bar or having your weekly wine night at home, these questions will get you and your BFF chatting about things that you (somehow!) never knew about each other. [7] X Research source What's the biggest secret you've ever spilled? What’s a secret that you’ve never told me? Who would you rather go out with, your favorite celebrity or your longtime crush? What's the most childish thing that you still do as an adult? What's the last lie you told? What's the weirdest dream that you can remember? Would you ever date someone twice your age? Would you hook up with your high school crush today? Who is the most annoying member of your family? Who’s your least favorite person out of everyone I’ve dated? What was your most embarrassing moment in high school? What's the weirdest thing you've ever been asked on a date? Have you ever canceled plans with me to hang out with someone else? What's one thing you've always wanted to say to me but haven't? What’s your unpopular opinion that you think I’ll disagree with? Would you consider going on Love Is Blind , Love Island , or The Bachelor ? Have you ever had a crush on someone that I liked or was dating? Did you think we would be best friends when you first met me? Would you call me your cool friend, funny friend, pretty friend, or mom/dad friend? If someone offered you a million dollars to never talk to me again, would you?

steps.title: Grow closer to your S.O. with these intimate questions.
steps.content: Grow closer to your S.O. with these intimate questions. These Qs are a great way to strengthen your bond, but make sure to “discuss what topics are off-limits or uncomfortable for each of you” before starting the game, recommends matchmaker Laura Bilotta. You or your partner may want to stay away from questions about past relationships, personal traumas, or other sensitive spots. If we had met earlier in our lives, do you think we’d still be together? What did you think about me when we first met? What do you really think about my parents? What do you really think about my friends? Have you ever gone through my things without telling me? What’s something you’ve never asked me to do but really, really want to? What’s one gift I gave you that you disliked but didn’t tell me you did? What do you love most about my body? What’s your least favorite sex position that we regularly use? What's something kinky you've always wanted to try but haven't yet? What’s a turn-on you’ve never told me about? What’s a turn-off you’ve never told me about? What's a habit of mine that you find the most annoying or difficult to live with? Do you feel like I support your dreams? Do you have any unresolved feelings for someone from your past? Do you have any doubts about our future together? Have you ever considered ending our relationship? When and why? Who comes to your mind as the ideal couple? What does your dream life look like?

steps.title: Gather at least two or more people to play the game.
steps.content: Gather at least two or more people to play the game. Get everyone a drink, or grab a liquor bottle and some shot glasses. Either pull up a list on your phone (* cough cough, this article *) or write out questions on little paper slips ahead of time to pick out of a hat or bowl. [8] X Research source Decide how much alcohol people should drink on each turn if they choose to. Depending on how difficult or embarrassing your questions are, you could ask people to take a full shot or just a sip. If you think people will be drinking a lot (rather than truthing), it’s recommended to stick to low-alcohol options like beer, wine, or heavy-on-the-mixer cocktails.

steps.title: Start with one player asking a Truth or Drink question.
steps.content: Start with one player asking a Truth or Drink question. The opposing player can either answer or take their drink. They then get to ask a new question to the other player(s). If you’re playing in a group, decide if players will randomly ask questions to each other or go in a certain order. [9] X Research source You can also assign one person to be the question master, meaning they won’t participate in the game but will be in charge of who gets asked which questions. You can also incorporate Truth or Drink into other drinking games. For example, if you’re playing King’s Cup , make players answer a Truth or Drink question when they pull a red or black face card.
